entry.source: 〉 There is a naked man wearing a mask{F801}inside the birdcage...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 There is a naked man wearing a mask{F801}inside the birdcage...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F813,0,124001}...Stop right there.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F813,0,124001}...Stop right there.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-416}{F813,0,124002}I am Gemori, the guardian of this{F801}birdcage.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-416}{F813,0,124002}I am Gemori, the guardian of this{F801}birdcage.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gemori\0{F87A,-416}{F813,0,124004}Come now... forget about the cage and{F801}let us make love together.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124005}I'll show you amazing love which{F801}anyone would die for...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gemori\0{F87A,-416}{F813,0,124004}Come now... forget about the cage and{F801}let us make love together.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124005}I'll show you amazing love which{F801}anyone would die for...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masked man\0{F813,0,124006}...Is someone there?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masked man\0{F813,0,124006}...Is someone there?{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Walter rushed to open the birdcage.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Walter rushed to open the birdcage.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124007}One of the fellows Gabby told us to{F801}rescue, I take it.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124007}One of the fellows Gabby told us to{F801}rescue, I take it.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124008}Don't worry, we mean you no harm.{F801}We're here on a rescue.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124009}He's dreadfully emaciated... I don't{F801}think we should leave him this way.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124008}Don't worry, we mean you no harm.{F801}We're here on a rescue.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124009}He's dreadfully emaciated... I don't{F801}think we should leave him this way.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124011}A woman named Gabby of the Eastern{F801}Kingdom of Mikado asked us to come{F801}to your aid.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124011}A woman named Gabby of the Eastern{F801}Kingdom of Mikado asked us to come{F801}to your aid.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masked man\0{F87A,28}{F813,0,124012}Gabby, eh...?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124013}I feel as if I recall that name,{F801}but this mask makes it so hard to{F801}be sure of anything.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masked man\0{F87A,28}{F813,0,124012}Gabby, eh...?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124013}I feel as if I recall that name,{F801}but this mask makes it so hard to{F801}be sure of anything.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124014}Then I'll have it off of you in{F801}but a moment.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124014}Then I'll have it off of you in{F801}but a moment.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masked man\0{F87A,28}{F813,0,124015}No, there is no point in trying...{F801}This mask can only be removed by a{F801}kindred spirit.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124016}But I can't even think who that{F801}kindred spirit would be...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masked man\0{F87A,28}{F813,0,124015}No, there is no point in trying...{F801}This mask can only be removed by a{F801}kindred spirit.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124016}But I can't even think who that{F801}kindred spirit would be...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124017}...Ah well.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124018}I'll see him safe on his way back{F801}to the Monastery.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124017}...Ah well.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124018}I'll see him safe on his way back{F801}to the Monastery.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124019}The rest will be up to you!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124019}The rest will be up to you!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124017}...Ah well.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124021}This is the last of them, then.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124022}I'll see him safe on his way back{F801}to the Monastery.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,124017}...Ah well.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124021}This is the last of them, then.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,124022}I'll see him safe on his way back{F801}to the Monastery.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Walter carried the man on his back and{F801}headed for the tower's exit.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Walter carried the man on his back and{F801}headed for the tower's exit.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Walter parted ways with you.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Walter parted ways with you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gemori\0{F87A,-416}{F813,0,124003}I knew of your coming. I know{F801}everything, after all.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gemori\0{F87A,-416}{F813,0,124003}I knew of your coming. I know{F801}everything, after all.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,400063}Looks like the quest is going well.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,400063}Looks like the quest is going well.{F801}
